Title: Director Analyst, Master Data Management (MDM), Remote
Description:
About the role:

Gartner Analysts are industry thought leaders who create must-have research, market predictions and best practices for a broad range of world-leading organizations. A Senior Director serves as a leader within Gartner‚Äôs Research and Advisory sector, establishing oneself as a credible voice within their designated market at local, regional and global levels.

Utilizing exceptional research and analytical skills, a Senior Director plays a significant role in producing pragmatic and provocative research which Gartner clients consume and apply to propel their business toward key objectives. They are a trusted source of advice for clients, reinforcing Gartner‚Äôs value every day by engaging them via in-person meetings, virtual meetings, sales support visits and Gartner conferences to discuss complex client challenges and offer appropriate recommendations.

The successful candidate is a subject matter expert in Master Data Management (MDM) and understands its application across people, processes, and technologies. The candidate will focus on written and customer-facing deliverables to support Data & Analytics Leaders who face the challenges of improving/establishing/reviving MDM initiatives. This role will require in depth knowledge of the MDM Market in addition to a strategic level understanding of the topic.

What you will do:


Create innovative, thought provoking, and highly leveraged ‚Äúmust-have research‚Äù content
Develop new research and ideas through thought leadership and offer compelling, actionable approaches to client's needs and requests that accelerate the client's ability to act
Develop in-depth analysis to identify the root cause of a client‚Äôs barriers or overall needs and reframe thinking to drive strategy forward
Demonstrate thought leadership in establishing research positions across a team of analysts
Bring provocative, independent insights to Gartner leaders that can evolve the course of a research agenda
Research, analyze and predict market trends and shifts to provide clients and vendors with actionable insights
Provide clients and prospects with actionable advice aligned to their designated content area via virtual or face-to-face interactions
Create and deliver high value presentation materials on and off stage for Gartner events, industry and professional association conferences, and client briefings
Support Research and Sales: Provide sales support serving as voice of the market to help research teams create content and to drive engagement with clients to make progress against their critical priorities to grow their business
Provide high quality and timely research content peer review
Build credibility as an industry expert to represent Gartner research, methodology and strategy
Actively participate in innovation, ideation, and research discussions and collaborate effectively with peers in the research community
Identify research process improvements or develop new processes that help the team and Research & Advisory provide excellent service delivery
Be a mentor and a coach by supporting more junior team members
Be client-centric while actively seeking to help clients engage regularly and often with Gartner research and interactions


What you will need:


Subject matter expertise, with demonstrated knowledge of Master Data Management (MDM) Strategy.
Deep understanding of the MDM market including (but not limited to): who the key players are, what core capabilities are required, the evolution of the market.
Detailed knowledge of one or more MDM Product(s), hands on experience of implementing an MDM solution is a plus.
Bachelor's Degree, Advanced Professional Qualification, or 10+ years direct experience in a field related to Data and Analytics.
Demonstrate executive presence; can immediately establish credibility with executives and additional stakeholders
Strong organizational skills, ability to work under tight deadlines and produce high quality deliverables
Demonstrate excellence in research and writing ability
Strong written and verbal proficiency, analytical and presentation skills; ability to engage clients and respond effectively to questions
Proficient in analyzing and synthesizing data; can effectively apply patterns and frameworks while drawing and defending conclusions to client challenges
Strong communicator who can explain complex concepts concisely and simply
Subject matter expert comfortable presenting at large and small-scale speaking engagements
Strong business and financial acumen
Deep knowledge of the global and competitive landscape within subject area as well as the interplay in that market
Ability to work independently, while also being intrinsically motivated to collaborate across teams and support the workflow of others, in a multicultural global team
Learning agile and adept with navigating highly matrixed environments
Ability to represent Gartner's research methodology and strategies effectively at all levels
Willingness and ability to travel up to 25% (where applicable)


Who you are:


You came from a Data & Analytics background and may have been a hands-on practitioner in the past but as your career progressed you may have transitioned into a leadership role, where you started leading teams or teams of teams.
You understand the bigger picture and the full lifecycle of data where considerations are made in governance, quality, integration, reusability, and management.
You are proficient in analyzing and synthesizing data; can effectively apply patterns and frameworks while drawing and defending conclusions to client challenges.
You enjoy learning and being challenged intellectually on new topic areas or adjustments to previously held beliefs.
You are versatile and able to pivot to new topics to match the challenges faced by our clients.
You are a strong communicator who can explain complex concepts concisely and simply.
You are a subject matter expert who is comfortable presenting at large and small-scale speaking engagements.
You can demonstrate executive presence and can immediately establish credibility with executives and additional stakeholders.


What makes Gartner Research a GREAT fit for you?


You are a team player who values expert insights, bold ideas and intellectual courage.
You are always learning and looking to discover what‚Äôs next in technology.
You pursue personal excellence through team collaboration and consensus.
You love to shape ideas and business-related recommendations to solve clients‚Äô biggest challenges.


Who are we?

At Gartner, Inc. (NYSE:IT), we guide the leaders who shape the world.

Our mission relies on expert analysis and bold ideas to deliver actionable, objective insight, helping enterprise leaders and their teams succeed with their mission-critical priorities.

Since our founding in 1979, we‚Äôve grown to more than 20,000 associates globally who support ~15,000 client enterprises in ~90 countries and territories. We do important, interesting and substantive work that matters. That‚Äôs why we hire associates with the intellectual curiosity, energy and drive to want to make a difference. The bar is unapologetically high. So is the impact you can have here.

What makes Gartner a great place to work?

Our sustained success creates limitless opportunities for you to grow professionally and flourish personally. We have a vast, virtually untapped market potential ahead of us, providing you with an exciting trajectory long into the future. How far you go is driven by your passion and performance.

We hire remarkable people who collaborate and win as a team. Together, our singular, unifying goal is to deliver results for our clients.

Our teams are inclusive and composed of individuals from different geographies, cultures, religions, ethnicities, races, genders, sexual orientations, abilities and generations.

We invest in great leaders who bring out the best in you and the company, enabling us to multiply our impact and results. This is why, year after year, we are recognized worldwide as a great place to work.

What do we offer?

Gartner offers world-class benefits, highly competitive compensation and disproportionate rewards for top performers.

In our hybrid work environment, we provide the flexibility and support for you to thrive ‚Äî working virtually when it's productive to do so and getting together with colleagues in a vibrant community that is purposeful, engaging and inspiring.

Ready to grow your career with Gartner? Join us.

The policy of Gartner is to provide equal employment opportunities to all applicants and employees without regard to race, color, creed, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, marital status, citizenship status, age, national origin, ancestry, disability, veteran status, or any other legally protected status and to seek to advance the principles of equal employment opportunity.

Gartner is committed to being an Equal Opportunity Employer and offers opportunities to all job seekers, including job seekers with disabilities. If you are a qualified individual with a disability or a disabled veteran, you may request a reasonable accommodation if you are unable or limited in your ability to use or access the Company‚Äôs career webpage as a result of your disability. You may request reasonable accommodations by calling Human Resources at +1 (203) 964-0096 or by sending an email to ApplicantAccommodations@gartner.com.

Job Requisition ID:97651

By submitting your information and application, you confirm that you have read and agree to the country or regional recruitment notice linked below applicable to your place of residence.

Gartner Applicant Privacy Link: https://jobs.gartner.com/applicant-privacy-policy

For efficient navigation through the application, please only use the back button within the application, not the back arrow within your browser.

Description:
Description And Requirements

Se vuoi cambiare il volto dell'energia, stiamo cercando neolaureati e neolaureate in corsi di laurea triennale o magistrale in informatica, ingegneria informatica, ingegneria gestionale e dell‚Äôautomazione o lauree affini, con interesse nelle tecnologie digitali e propensione all'innovazione da inserire nella Global Information and Communication Technologies nel team Data Governance and Intelligence Delivery si occupa di realizzare, manutenere ed evolvere le soluzioni di Business Intelligence, Advanced Analytics ed Artificial Intelligence specifiche per differenti Business Line del Gruppo Enel

Cosa farai


Avrai l‚Äôopportunit√† di partecipare a progetti che prevedono la realizzazione di nuove funzionalit√† su data platform e/o alla sviluppo di soluzioni di Business Intelligence e Advanced Analytics, seguendo tutte le fasi del ciclo di vita di sviluppo del software;
Svolgerai attivit√† di Data Analysis di strutture dati complesse utili a fornire risposte data-driven ai quesiti aziendali;
Potrai contribuire allo sviluppo di strumenti per l'estrazione, la trasformazione e il caricamento (ETL) dei dati all‚Äôinterno delle data platform;
Potrai contribuire allo sviluppo di Dashboard e report operativi;
Potrai contribuire allo sviluppo di servizi API scalabili basati su architettura a microservizi.


Cosa porterai

Requisisti minimi necessari per questo ruolo sono:

Competenze richieste:


Fondamenti di programmazione e conoscenza dei principali linguaggi di programmazione
Fondamenti di Sviluppo e Debugging
Fondamenti di API e Architettura Software
Conoscenza di Database (concetti di database relazionali, SQL, basi di NoSQL)
Conoscenza dei fondamenti di Versionamento e Build (Uso base di Git)


Soft skills richieste: ottime capacit√† di problem solving, propensione all‚Äôapprendimento continuo, passione per la tecnologia e l‚Äôinnovazione, attitudine al lavoro in team.

Istruzione, competenze linguistiche e altre informazioni pertinenti:


laureati in corsi di laurea triennale o magistrale in informatica, in ingegneria informatica, ingegneria gestionale e dell‚Äôautomazione o materie affini
Buona conoscenza della lingua inglese


Ulteriori requisiti considerati come plus:


la conoscenza di tool di Business Intelligence/Data Visualization come Qlik Sense e PowerBI
conoscenza della lingua spagnola.


Perch√© unirsi a noi?


Tirocinio extracurriculare
Rimborso mensile di 800 euro lordi al mese pi√π i buoni pasto
Modalit√† di tirocinio ibrida


Sede: preferibilmente Roma; verranno prese in considerazione anche candidature da altre sedi

Diversit√†, equit√†, inclusione e processo di selezione

Questa opportunit√† √® aperta a tutti i candidati e le candidate: promuoviamo e garantiamo condizioni di parit√† di genere e creiamo un ambiente di lavoro inclusivo, equo e rispettoso, affinch√© ognuno ogni persona possa esprimere il proprio potenziale e partecipare alla creazione di valore tangibile.

Il nostro processo di selezione √® personalizzato per ogni ruolo e include un colloquio con il nostro team di recruiting e un incontro con i nostri colleghi e colleghe della business line. Se sei in linea con la Job Description, il team di recruiting ti contatter√†, fornendoti ulteriori informazioni sul processo di selezione.

Cerchiamo persone che incarnino i nostri valori: Fiducia, Rispetto, Innovazione, Proattivit√† e Flessibilit√†.

Sei pronto/a a fare la differenza e crescere con noi? Candidati ora e unisciti a noi per guidare la transizione energetica!

Chi siamo

Enel Spa

Siamo un‚Äôazienda leader globale nella generazione elettrica e nella distribuzione e vendita dell‚Äôenergia, e il pi√π grande operatore privato di rinnovabili, grazie ai nostri impianti eolici, idroelettrici, fotovoltaici e geotermici.

Produciamo, distribuiamo e vendiamo energia in 28 Paesi del mondo tra Europa, Americhe, Africa, Asia e Oceania, lavorando nel rispetto e per la valorizzazione di territori, comunit√† locali e clienti.

Lavoriamo per garantire reti elettriche sempre pi√π efficienti, resilienti e digitalizzate e un‚Äôelevata qualit√† dei servizi, gestendo 1,9 milioni di chilometri di rete e investendo in tecnologie di accumulo che integrano la produzione rinnovabile, stabilizzano il sistema elettrico e consentono di gestire l'intermittenza delle fonti rinnovabili.

Innovazione e sostenibilit√† sono parte del nostro Piano Strategico: investiamo in nuove tecnologie e nuovi modi di realizzare e gestire gli impianti, le reti e i servizi dedicati ai clienti, incoraggiandoli verso un uso pi√π consapevole dell‚Äôenergia.

Con una capacit√† istallata di oltre 87 GW di cui 62 da fonte rinnovabile e 60 milioni di clienti nel mondo, lavoriamo per una transizione energetica giusta e l‚Äôelettrificazione pulita, grazie anche ai nostri servizi di mobilit√† elettrica, accessibili e affidabili con una rete di circa 26.200 punti di ricarica pubblici.

Curioso/a di noi? Esplora qui www.enel.com

Innovazione e sostenibilit√† sono parte del nostro Piano Strategico: investiamo in nuove tecnologie e nuovi modi di realizzare e gestire gli impianti, le reti e i servizi dedicati ai clienti, incoraggiandoli verso un uso pi√π consapevole dell‚Äôenergia.

Con una capacit√† istallata di oltre 87 GW di cui 62 da fonte rinnovabile e 60 milioni di clienti nel mondo, lavoriamo per una transizione energetica giusta e l‚Äôelettrificazione pulita, grazie anche ai nostri servizi di mobilit√† elettrica, accessibili e affidabili con una rete di circa 26.200 punti di ricarica pubblici.

Title: Data & AI Consultant | Senior Consultant - Roma
Description:
At PwC, our people in data and analytics focus on leveraging data to drive insights and make informed business decisions. They utilise advanced analytics techniques to help clients optimise their operations and achieve their strategic goals. In business intelligence at PwC, you will focus on leveraging data and analytics to provide strategic insights and drive informed decision-making for clients. You will develop and implement innovative solutions to optimise business performance and enhance competitive advantage.

Focused on relationships, you are building meaningful client connections, and learning how to manage and inspire others. Navigating increasingly complex situations, you are growing your personal brand, deepening technical expertise and awareness of your strengths. You are expected to anticipate the needs of your teams and clients, and to deliver quality. Embracing increased ambiguity, you are comfortable when the path forward isn‚Äôt clear, you ask questions, and you use these moments as opportunities to grow.

Skills

Examples of the skills, knowledge, and experiences you need to lead and deliver value at this level include but are not limited to:


Respond effectively to the diverse perspectives, needs, and feelings of others.
Use a broad range of tools, methodologies and techniques to generate new ideas and solve problems.
Use critical thinking to break down complex concepts.
Understand the broader objectives of your project or role and how your work fits into the overall strategy.
Develop a deeper understanding of the business context and how it is changing.
Use reflection to develop self awareness, enhance strengths and address development areas.
Interpret data to inform insights and recommendations.
Uphold and reinforce professional and technical standards (e.g. refer to specific PwC tax and audit guidance), the Firm's code of conduct, and independence requirements.


Minimum Years Experience Required

Title: Retail Business Analyst - Sost.maternit√†
HTML:
Descrizione del lavoro

REFERRAL 1

Attivita‚Äô

  • Redazione dei flussi di reporting e prospetti analitici periodici dell‚Äôarea Retail;
  • Supporto alla redazione di presentazioni per i director‚Äôs meeting;
  • Attivit√† di supporto per elaborazioni delle attivit√† commerciali;
  • Calcolo profili commissionali a supporto della divisione Amministrazione e Finanza;
  • Analisi di redditivit√† delle linee di business dell‚Äôarea Retail e verifiche periodiche di congruenza;
  • Assistere il Responsabile Business Analysis Manager del business Retail nelle analisi relative alle iniziative di promozione, campagne, programmi commerciali, ecc.;
  • Supporto alla preparazione di analisi economico-finanziarie ad hoc.

Caratteristiche

  • Laurea triennale in Economia, Finanza o titolo equivalente;
  • Ottime competenze in Excel (conoscenza di Excel se neolaureato);
  • Esperienza con ERP finanziari e applicativi di business intelligence (conoscenza di ERP e BI se neolaureato);
  • Estrema passione per l'attenzione ai dettagli;
  • Ottime capacit√† comunicative scritte e orali in italiano e inglese;
  • Capacit√† di apprendere rapidamente e gestire con successo pi√π progetti contemporaneamente;
  • Ottime capacit√† relazionali e interpersonali.

Informazioni aggiuntive

Entra a far parte della nostra azienda: ecco quello che abbiamo riservato per te!

  • Lavoro flessibile con modello di Smart Working consolidato;
  • I nostri uffici sono sempre aperti: il contatto, il clima aziendale e il confronto con i tuoi colleghi/e sono la nostra forza per trovare sempre l‚Äôispirazione giusta;
  • Ticket restaurant giornalieri, sia nei giorni on site che quando lavori da remoto;
  • Assicurazione Sanitaria integrativa per te e la tua famiglia;
  • Agevolazione sull‚Äôacquisto dell‚Äôabbonamento ai trasporti pubblici;
  • Un programma di Wellbeing che si rinnova continuamente: Padel, Yoga, Canottaggio per i pi√π sportivi, lo sportello counseling e percorsi di formazione sul benessere e sulla resilienza sono solo alcune delle attivit√† a cui potrai accedere;
  • Progetti strutturati sulla DE&I.

At Entain, we do what's right. It's one of our core values and that's why we're taking the lead when it comes to creating a diverse, equitable and inclusive future - for our people, and the wider global sports betting and gaming sector. However you identify, our ambition is to ensure our people across the globe feel valued, respected and their individuality celebrated.

We comply with all applicable recruitment regulations and employment laws in the jurisdictions where we operate, ensuring ethical and compliant hiring practices globally.

Un contesto stimolante e dinamico che incentiva la creativit√† e il lavoro di squadra

The chance to build a better future is right in front of you

Do Work That Matters ‚Äì Your Role And Responsibilities

Do you want to do work that is truly meaningful and impactful? At KPMG, you‚Äôll have the opportunity to help clients, society, and colleagues tackle and solve the most current and complex challenges.

KPMG Open Platform is our new innovative Hub based in Naples , created to develop service models and high-tech solutions for businesses and Public Administration. The areas of focus include Cyber Security, Program Management for large-scale transformation projects in the Public sector, Application Maintenance, and Managed Services.

By joining our Team , you will be involved in managing business transformation processes related to the maintenance and optimization of software developed internally by KPMG. You will work closely with colleagues who are experts in implementing advanced digital solutions for clients in the Financial Services sector, ensuring the operational efficiency of systems and effectively supporting business processes.

Specifically, you will be involved in the following activities:


Implementing complex procedures for managing business processes
Writing SQL queries for extracting and/or deleting data in databases
Managing the maintenance of the Database and the procedures for the implemented queries
Drafting technical analyses of end-to-end processes and monitoring interfaces
Integrating data from different sources or systems, working on ETL processes
Delivering training sessions to corporate users
Supporting the solution release and Hypercare phase
Creating customized reports for users and performing data analyses to improve data quality


Come As You Are ‚Äì Your Skills And Characteristics

This opportunity is perfect for you if:


You have excellent communication skills and can adapt your language to different audiences while effectively identifying and managing priorities
You are interested in gaining experience in data analysis with a strong focus on technological innovation
You have familiarity and interest in the programming field
You have a good command of the English language, preferably with study-abroad experience
You have earned a diploma or a bachelor‚Äôs/master‚Äôs degree in a technical-scientific field


Your Future With Us ‚Äì What You‚Äôll Find at KPMG


An inclusive and fair workplace that respects, encourages, and values diversity
A stimulating and dynamic environment that promotes creativity and teamwork
A hybrid working model to support a healthy work-life balance
Advanced training and development programs to keep your skills up to date
An international mindset and innovative projects
Initiatives focused on physical and mental well-being


Together for Better ‚Äì Our Values and Commitment

Leadership, teamwork, respect for individuality, continuous learning, transparency, community commitment, and integrity: these are the Values of KPMG that create an environment open to the exchange of ideas and knowledge, allowing our professionals to reach their full potential.

Thanks to our commitment to fostering an inclusive workplace , our Network has earned ISO 30415 certification , attesting to the compliance of our Diversity and Inclusion Management System, and UNI PdR 125 certification for gender equality.

You can find a summary of all the concrete actions we are taking on environmental, social, and governance (ESG) issues in our Impact Plan ‚Äì Our Impact Plan .

Join us!

Your data will be processed in full compliance with Regulation (EU) No. 679/2016 (General Data Protection Regulation ‚Äì "GDPR") and subsequent amendments. For more information, please refer to KPMG‚Äôs privacy policy.

The areas of focus include Cyber Security, Program Management for large-scale transformation projects in the Public sector, Application Maintenance, and Managed Services.

By joining our Team , you will be involved in managing business transformation processes related to the maintenance and optimization of software developed internally by KPMG. You will work closely with colleagues who are experts in implementing advanced digital solutions for clients in the Financial Services sector, ensuring the operational efficiency of systems and effectively supporting business processes.

Specifically, you will be involved in the following activities:

  • Implementing complex procedures for managing business processes
  • Writing SQL queries for extracting and/or deleting data in databases
  • Managing the maintenance of the Database and the procedures for the implemented queries
  • Drafting technical analyses of end-to-end processes and monitoring interfaces
  • Integrating data from different sources or systems, working on ETL processes
  • Delivering training sessions to corporate users
  • Supporting the solution release and Hypercare phase
  • Creating customized reports for users and performing data analyses to improve data quality

Come As You Are ‚Äì Your Skills And Characteristics

This opportunity is perfect for you if:

  • You have excellent communication skills and can adapt your language to different audiences while effectively identifying and managing priorities
  • You are interested in gaining experience in data analysis with a strong focus on technological innovation
  • You have familiarity and interest in the programming field
  • You have a good command of the English language, preferably with study-abroad experience
  • You have earned a diploma or a bachelor‚Äôs/master‚Äôs degree in a technical-scientific field

Your Future With Us ‚Äì What You‚Äôll Find at KPMG

  • An inclusive and fair workplace that respects, encourages, and values diversity
  • A stimulating and dynamic environment that promotes creativity and teamwork
  • A hybrid working model to support a healthy work-life balance
  • Advanced training and development programs to keep your skills up to date
  • An international mindset and innovative projects
  • Initiatives focused on physical and mental well-being

Together for Better ‚Äì Our Values and Commitment

Leadership, teamwork, respect for individuality, continuous learning, transparency, community commitment, and integrity: these are the Values of KPMG that create an environment open to the exchange of ideas and knowledge, allowing our professionals to reach their full potential.

Thanks to our commitment to fostering an inclusive workplace , our Network has earned ISO 30415 certification , attesting to the compliance of our Diversity and Inclusion Management System, and UNI PdR 125 certification for gender equality.

You can find a summary of all the concrete actions we are taking on environmental, social, and governance (ESG) issues in our Impact Plan ‚Äì Our Impact Plan .

Join us!

Your data will be processed in full compliance with Regulation (EU) No. 679/2016 (General Data Protection Regulation ‚Äì "GDPR") and subsequent amendments. For more information, please refer to KPMG‚Äôs privacy policy.

KPMG Open Platform S.r.l. SB ensures equal opportunities.

Title: Software Developer DataStage, Italy
Description:
About Us

We‚Äôre visionary innovators who provide trading and workflow automation solutions, high-value analytics, and strategic consulting to corporations, financial institutions, central banks, and governments. More than 40% of the world‚Äôs largest companies use our solutions. We‚Äôve achieved tremendous growth by bringing together some of the best and most successful financial technology companies in the world.

At ION, we offer careers that provide many opportunities: To invent. To design. To collaborate. To build. To transform businesses and empower people around the world to do more, faster and better than before. Imagine what you can do and experience. This is where you can do your best work.

Learn more at iongroup.com.

Your Role

Your duties and responsibilities


Selected candidates will manage the entire software lifecycle, from design to implementation, and will be trained in the main banking processes with the aim of collaborating in the creation of important information system evolution projects.
They will be placed within teams that deal with the design, implementation and maintenance of software products and information systems for the provision of services to banks and related processes.
They will participate in new product implementation projects and support the transition of our platform to evolved Cloud systems, in a dynamic and international context.


Other duties

We might ask you to perform other tasks and duties as your role expands.

Your Skills, Experience, And Qualifications Required


Bachelor's degree with honors in technical/scientific areas (computer science, mathematics, physics, computer engineering, management engineering, economics)
Knowledge of and ability to use programming languages DataStage / .Net / Java
Applied skills in relational databases, object-oriented programming, interfaces
Expertise in programming, technical and/or functional analysis
At least two to five years of experience in software development
Excellent knowledge of the English language
Excellent interpersonal skills
Excellent communication and negotiation skills, aptitude for teamwork


What We Offer

Permanent employment contract

Location:

Roma, Italy

Important Notes

According to the Italian Law (L.68/99) please note that candidates from the disability list will be given priority.

Title: Data Analyst (0 Experience Required)
Description:
For thousands of years, maps have provided humans with the knowledge they need to make decisions. As a Maps Evaluator, you will have the opportunity to provide ground truth for your town, city or country.




At Peroptyx, we are looking for Data Analysts who will review mapping data for digital mapping applications. Your research capabilities will validate and ensure that the navigation of certain routes are accurate and safe.




As part of this role you will verify that business names and opening hours are correct. You will check that the distance from a starting point to an end destination is listed accurately resulting in better user experiences.




With this job you can plan your days around this highly flexible working schedule, work weekends or late evenings, all from the comfort of your own office. The flexibility of our roles minimizes the impact on your daily routine.




So, whether you are a student looking to earn as you learn, a retiree looking for a new challenge a part-time/full time professional or a work from home parent, Peroptyx has the right role for you!




Benefits

Work up to 20 hours per week.
Earn a competitive rate of pay.
Develop your research skills.
Avoid the long commute.
Work from the comfort of your home office.
Enjoy the flexibility of setting your own working hours!




Ideal Candidate

Fluent in English and Italian.
Excellent research skills.
Excellent local knowledge of your home country.
Good understanding and general knowledge of the geography and culture of Italy.
Analytical mindset.




Job Requirements

Must be living in Italy for a minimum of 5 consecutive years.
Must pass an online open-book exam that can verify your full understanding of the material and concepts.
Must be willing to work a minimum of 10 hours and up to 20 hours per week depending on task availability.
Good working knowledge of search engines, map applications and familiarity with social media platforms.
Strong ability to learn, understand and apply multiple sets of different instructions.
All work must be of an independent nature.







Apply Online Today!

Title: Data Engineer
Description:
Siamo il Gruppo Lottomatica, leader nel settore del gioco regolamentato in Italia e uno dei maggiori operatori europei, in tutte le aree di attivit√†: scommesse sportive, gioco online e macchine da intrattenimento. Offriamo ai nostri clienti esperienze di gioco sicure e di qualit√†, attraverso tutti i canali, ponendo la responsabilit√† e la sostenibilit√† al centro del business. Essere in Lottomatica √® molto pi√π che far parte di un'azienda: significa contribuire a un progetto imprenditoriale grande e responsabile.




Siamo alla ricerca di un profilo di un Data Engineer che entrer√† a far parte del del team di Advanced Analytics Data Platform, per lo sviluppo dei flussi dati della Data Platform aziendale e la distribuzione di soluzioni integrate di Intelligenza Artificiale verso tutte le aree aziendali.




Requisiti:

Almeno 2 anni di esperienza nel ruolo
Conoscenza del linguaggio SQL
Conoscenza del linguaggio Python
Conoscenza del framework Apache Spark e dell‚Äôecosistema Hadoop
Conoscenza base di DevOps
Conoscenza dello sviluppo di pipeline ETL




Principali attivit√†:

La risorsa si occuper√† di una o pi√π delle seguenti attivit√† a seconda della seniority:

Implementazione di flussi di ingestion
Implementazione di processi di Data Preparation
Implementazione di pipeline di consume del dato ( pipeline di export, API)
Disegni architetturali e di processo




Sar√† considerato un plus:

Conoscenza Azure Databricks
Conoscenza Docker Container
Conoscenza base bash e sistemi operativi Unix
Conoscenza di processi di Data Quality
Conoscenza Azure Data Factory
Conoscenza di MongoDB e dei database NoSQL
Conoscenza di SQL Server e del relativo Integration Services (SSIS)
Esperienza pratica MLOps
Esperienza di design architetturale di integrazioni componenti cloud-onpremise
Esperienza nella progettazione di database, strategie e i meccanismi di accesso ai dati, sicurezza e controllo dell‚Äôintegrit√†, servizi di ingegneria e i sistemi distribuiti




Cosa troverai in Lottomatica:

Opportunit√† di lavorare nella pi√π grande azienda di scommesse e giochi in Italia e una delle pi√π grandi al mondo;
Lavorare in un ambiente molto dinamico e migliorare le proprie competenze acquisendone di nuove;
Essere sfidati a fornire soluzioni d'impatto per grandi organizzazioni e avere un impatto diretto sui loro dipendenti;
Possibilit√† di partecipare a progetti di beneficenza, legalit√† e responsabilit√† attraverso l'impegno in Fondazione Lottomatica;
Un modello di DNA aziendale definito in cui Inclusione, Valore della Diversit√†, Eccellenza e Collaborazione sono i pilastri;
Far parte dell'azienda numero uno al mondo nel settore per impegno ESG;
Eccellenti opportunit√† di crescita.




Cosa offriamo:

Contratto a tempo indeterminato e opportunit√† di lavoro ibrido;
Laptop aziendale;
Formazione continua su hard skills e soft skills;
Stipendio annuo lordo commisurato all'esperienza (40-45K)







Lottomatica attua una politica che garantisce pari opportunit√† e promuove diversit√† e inclusione, contro ogni forma di discriminazione.

In Lottomatica crediamo che ogni persona sia unica e consideriamo la diversity come una fonte di arricchimento personale e organizzativo.

Ci impegniamo ogni giorno affinch√© il nostro sia un ambiente aperto, sicuro e inclusivo, dove ogni persona possa essere pienamente se stessa indipendentemente da genere, religione, sesso, et√†, etnia, nazionalit√†, disabilit√†, stato civile o orientamento sessuale.







******

We are the Lottomatica Group, leader in regulated gaming in Italy and one of the largest European operators, in all areas of activity: sports betting, online gaming and amusement machines. We offer our customers safe and quality gaming experiences, through all channels, putting responsibility and sustainability at the core of the business. Being in Lottomatica is much more than being part of a company: it means contributing to a great and responsible entrepreneurial project.




We are looking for a Data Engineer to join the Advanced Analytics Data Platform team for the development of data flows within the company's Data Platform and the distribution of integrated Artificial Intelligence solutions across all business areas.




Requirements:

At least 2 years of experience in the role
Knowledge of SQL
Knowledge of Python
Familiarity with Apache Spark and the Hadoop ecosystem
Basic DevOps knowledge
Experience in developing ETL pipelines




Main Responsibilities:

Depending on seniority, the candidate will be responsible for one or more of the following activities:

Implementation of data ingestion flows
Implementation of Data Preparation processes
Implementation of data consumption pipelines (export pipelines, APIs)
Architectural and process design




Nice to Have:

Knowledge of Azure Databricks
Experience with Docker Containers
Basic knowledge of Bash and Unix operating systems
Understanding of Data Quality processes
Knowledge of Azure Data Factory
Familiarity with MongoDB and NoSQL databases
Experience with SQL Server and Integration Services (SSIS)
Hands-on experience with MLOps
Experience in designing cloud-on-premise integration architectures
Expertise in database design, data access strategies and mechanisms, data security and integrity control, engineering services, and distributed systems




What you will find in Lottomatica:

Opportunity to work in the largest betting and gaming company in Italy and one of the largest in the world;
Work in a dynamic environment and improve your skills while acquiring new ones;
Being challenged to provide impactful solutions for large organisations and have a direct impact on their employees;
Opportunity to participate in charity, legality and responsibility projects through engagement in Fondazione Lottomatica;
A defined corporate DNA model in which Inclusion, Value of Diversity, Excellence and Collaboration are the pillars;
Being part of the world's number one company in the industry for ESG commitment;
Excellent growth opportunities.




What we offer:

Permanent contract and hybrid work opportunities;
Company laptop;
Continuous training on hard and soft skills;
Annual gross salary commensurate with experience (40-45K)







Lottomatica implements a policy that guarantees equal opportunities and promotes diversity and inclusion, against all forms of discrimination. At Lottomatica we believe that each person is unique and we consider diversity as a source of personal and organizational enrichment. We strive every day for ours to be an open, safe and inclusive environment, where each person can be fully himself or herself regardless of gender, religion, sex, age, ethnicity, nationality, disability, marital status or sexual orientation.

  • Work in a dynamic environment and improve your skills while acquiring new ones;
  • Being challenged to provide impactful solutions for large organisations and have a direct impact on their employees;
  • Opportunity to participate in charity, legality and responsibility projects through engagement in Fondazione Lottomatica;
  • A defined corporate DNA model in which Inclusion, Value of Diversity, Excellence and Collaboration are the pillars;
  • Being part of the world's number one company in the industry for ESG commitment;
  • Excellent growth opportunities.


What we offer:

  • Permanent contract and hybrid work opportunities;
  • Company laptop;
  • Continuous training on hard and soft skills;
  • Annual gross salary commensurate with experience (40-45K)



Lottomatica implements a policy that guarantees equal opportunities and promotes diversity and inclusion, against all forms of discrimination. At Lottomatica we believe that each person is unique and we consider diversity as a source of personal and organizational enrichment. We strive every day for ours to be an open, safe and inclusive environment, where each person can be fully himself or herself regardless of gender, religion, sex, age, ethnicity, nationality, disability, marital status or sexual orientation.

Title: EY Public Sector | Collaboratore esterno - Analisi Dati
HTML:
Unisciti al nostro team Public e dai una svolta alla tua carriera entrando in EY.

Chi √® EY?

EY √® una delle societ√† Big 4 della consulenza. Quello che ci caratterizza rispetto alle altre aziende √® la possibilit√† di trasformare il business e il modo di lavorare dei nostri clienti, che siano grandi multinazionali, piccole imprese o pubbliche amministrazioni. La nostra cultura del lavoro si basa sulla fiducia, l‚Äôautonomia e il rispetto tra le persone, ed √® incentrata sul raggiungimento dei risultati attraverso una modalit√† di lavoro ibrida.

#TELLMEY ‚Äì Cosa dicono di noi

Questi sono i fattori pi√π influenti che hanno spinto colleghe e colleghi a sceglierci nel 2024!

  • Learning and Development: oltre 50 ore all‚Äôanno di formazione per ciascuna persona;
  • Progressione di carriera: solo negli ultimi 12 mesi il 65% delle persone di EY si √® vista riconoscere un avanzamento di carriera;
  • Salary e Benefits: con un‚Äôampia gamma di convenzioni aziendali, dalla palestra allo shopping, fino a servizi gratuiti di telemedicina e supporto psicologico;
  • Mobilit√† e opportunit√† internazionali, compresa la possibilit√† di lavorare dall‚Äôestero fino a 20 giorni senza essere in trasferta;
  • Smart working senza giornate prestabilite centralmente.

Public Sector: un nome solo, ma tanti mondi in cui portare il proprio contributo.

Il team Public & Healthcare √® un gruppo di professionisti caratterizzati da competenze multidisciplinari. In particolare:

  • Il team Public Policies accompagna il percorso di trasformazione delle pubbliche amministrazioni, offrendo sia servizi di supporto al policy making a livello UE e nazionale, accesso al funding per i mercati pubblici e privati e analisi di impatto delle politiche pubbliche, sia soluzioni per migliorare i processi di governance e programmazione dei fondi UE e nazionali, la gestione e il monitoraggio della spesa pubblica e il trasferimento di know-how e best practice.
  • Il team Healthcare, con un approccio focalizzato sulla trasformazione digitale e sostenibile dei processi aziendali in ambito pubblico e sanitario, ottimizza l‚Äôuso delle risorse anche attraverso l‚Äôimplementazione di soluzioni tecnologiche innovative in grado di migliorare l'accessibilit√† e la qualit√† dei servizi.

Quali sono le attivit√† del ruolo?

Il profilo ricercato dovr√† supportare il cliente, pubblica amministrazione centrale, principalmente nell‚Äôambito di attivit√† di analisi di dati e reportistica di dettaglio, per favorire le esigenze conoscitive dell‚ÄôUfficio sulle tematiche oggetto di studio.

Sono pertanto privilegiate competenze/esperienze volte all'analisi dei processi amministrativo-gestionali, finalizzati anche al perseguimento di percorsi di digitalizzazione.

La persona verr√† coinvolta in attivit√† di:

  • Analisi dei dati;
  • Reporting & Dashboarding;
  • Analisi dei processi della PA e definizione di processi evoluti in chiave digitale;
  • Raccolta dei requisiti delle Pubbliche Amministrazioni;
  • Assistenza tecnica nelle attivit√† di riferimento dell'Ufficio.

Chi stiamo cercando? Persone con:

  • Laurea magistrale, specialistica o laurea ante D.M. n. 509/1999 in discipline economico-gestionali oppure o altro titolo di studio universitario conseguito all‚Äôestero riconosciuto idoneo ai sensi dell‚Äôart. 38, comma 3, del D.lgs. n. 165/2001;
  • Almeno 5 anni di esperienza su progetti di assistenza tecnica, o attivit√† similari, preferibilmente presso enti della Pubblica Amministrazione;
  • Conoscenza di base di sistemi informativi;
  • Metodologie di analisi dati;
  • Ottime doti comunicative;
  • Problem solving;
  • Una buona conoscenza del pacchetto Office, in particolare di Excel;
  • Disponibilit√† al lavoro in presenza presso la sede del cliente (Roma).

Cosa ti aspetta in EY

  • Progetti di ogni tipo per clienti di ogni settore;
  • + 450.000 ore di formazione erogate per accrescere le tue competenze tecniche e il tuo talento personale;
  • Un Counselor che ti supporter√† nel tuo percorso professionale;
  • Policy di smart working flessibile e possibilit√† di lavorare dall‚Äôestero;
  • Benefits e programmi di welfare aziendale diversificati.

EY promuove la diversit√†, l‚Äôequit√† e l‚Äôinclusione, valorizzando l‚Äôunicit√†, indipendentemente da et√†, genere, abilit√†, esperienza, cultura, orientamento sessuale, religione, disabilit√† e background socioeconomico. Tutte le nostre offerte di lavoro si rivolgono allo stesso modo a persone con disabilit√†, in conformit√† con la legge italiana L. 68/99. Il nostro obiettivo √® creare un ambiente di lavoro equo e accessibile.

Title: Junior Data Analytics Engineer
HTML:
Immobiliare.it S.p.A. is an Italian group composed of companies specializing in Digital Tech services for the sale and rental of real estate, aimed at individuals, real estate professionals, banking institutions and financial sector operators.


Founded in 2005, Immobiliare.it, the No. 1 real estate portal in Italy, has expanded its offering with specialized portals such as Trovacasa.it, MioAffitto and LuxuryEstate.com, dedicated to luxury properties.


Immobiliare.it Insights, the company's proptech division, offers digital advisory, insights and data diligence services to banks, investors and appraisers. A leading player in Italy in the mortgage sector, the group includes Immobiliare.it Mutui, specializing in remote credit brokerage, Euroansa with a network of over 800 credit brokers throughout the country and Genio Diligence, a company focused on credit risk and fraud prevention for brokers and financial institutions. The group is also present in foreign markets in Spain (Pisos.com, Indomio.es and Enalquiler.com), Greece (Spitogatos.gr, Indomio.gr), Slovenia (Nekretnine.net) and Croatia (Crozilla.com and Indomio.hr).


We are looking for a Junior Data Analytics Engineer to join our Marketing team.


What you will learn:

  • marketing analytics: measurement of marketing campaigns with a focus on causality, optimization and data-driven decision-making;
  • data management and architecture: data warehousing and big data analytics using cloud technologies (GCP, AWS) and open-source tools (Airflow, dataform, dbt);
  • data pipelines: design and manage reliable marketing data pipelines to provide new insights and detect threats and opportunities;
  • data products: build end-to-end marketing data products combining internal data with several external sources like market and industry trends (e.g. market data, Google searches, online research) and competitive intelligence tools (e.g. Similarweb, data.ai, Semrush).


Who you are:

  • new graduate in Engineering, Statistics, Economics, Mathematics, Physics;
  • analytical mindset with a problem solving approach;
  • curious and passionate about marketing and tech platforms;
  • fluent in English and working knowledge of Italian.


Nice-to-have skills:

  • experience with Python and SQL;
  • familiarity with Google Cloud Platform.


About our team:

Our team is responsible for all marketing activities of our Group: Immobiliare.it (Italy), Indomio.es (Spain), Immotop.lu (Luxembourg), Crozilla.com (Croatia) and LuxuryEstate (Global)


We focus mainly on:

  • performance marketing: we design, create and manage campaigns with different business objectives (e.g. user acquisition and engagement, lead generation and brand awareness). We are one of the top advertisers in our markets, we collaborate with the best partners and our strong relationship with them allow us to develop ad-hoc projects and to access new features, products and technologies before they‚Äôre widely released;
  • analytics: Our products generate hundreds of millions of events every day, by analysing these interactions we can learn about our customers and their experience, optimise marketing investments, uncover new opportunities, and support data-driven decision-making.
  • market and competitor insights: we study the real estate market and our industry to uncover emerging trends, discover business opportunities and forecast demand as accurately as possible to stay ahead of the curve;
  • projects: we drive growth, operational and technological improvements working cross-team and cross-competence (Tech, Product, Sales, PR & Content teams).


What we offer:

  • a young and dynamic work environment;
  • an opportunity in a fast-growing company;
  • paid internship contract or fixed contract;
  • ticket restaurants;
  • free coffee and fresh fruit every day;
  • break room with a foosball table;
  • office located in the centre of Rome (Termini).


This announcement is addressed to people of any sex, pursuant to laws 903/77 and 125/91, and to people of all ages and all nationalities, pursuant to legislative decrees 215/03 and 216/03.

Title: Work from Home Italy
Description:

Assess diverse media categories: music, books, podcasts, videos, and more.

Utilize your cultural knowledge and market expertise to validate query intent.




Why Join the AI Community?

Support machine learning for world-leading brands with no prior professional experience.

Title: Analista statistico Roma
Description:
Generazione Vincente SpA ‚Äì Agenzia per il Lavoro ‚Äì ricerca per Ente operante nel Settore Agroalimentare:




un/una ESPERTO IN STATISTICA ECONOMICA E GESTIONE BASI DATI.




Posizione

La risorsa, con competenze in scienze statistiche economiche e gestione basi dati, dovr√† supportare i responsabili delle attivit√† previste con particolare riferimento all‚Äôimplementazione della banca dati.

Si occuper√† della ricognizione, dell‚Äôorganizzazione e dell'elaborazione dei dati e delle informazioni disponibili in merito ai terreni agricoli e alle strutture ad essi associate, ai regimi di possesso, alle modalit√† di accesso al credito, all‚Äôandamento del mercato agricolo e, pi√π in generale, a tutti gli aspetti legati alle dinamiche fondiarie.

Supporter√†, inoltre, il referente nella preparazione e validazione del dataset e nell'analisi esplorativa e diagnostica dei dati provenienti da indagini quali/quantitative e in

generale nell‚Äôanalisi ed elaborazione dei dati disponibili relativi alle aziende agricole e alle loro

strategie di difesa attiva e di prevenzione dei rischi.







Requisiti

La risorsa ideale sar√† in possesso dei seguenti requisiti:

‚Ä¢Laurea triennale in scienze statistiche;

‚Ä¢Esperienza di almeno 5 anni in attivit√† di elaborazione dei dati sul settore agricolo, attivit√† di archiviazione e gestione dei dati statistici su DWH, supporto alla realizzazione di indagini quali-quantitative e di tipo panel.

‚Ä¢Ottima conoscenza del pacchetto Office, buona conoscenza dei SW statistici e di gestione BD (SPSS, Analysis services, MySQL, SQL server, ecc.);

‚Ä¢Completano il profilo capacit√† di analizzare e valutare, concretezza, capacit√† di organizzazione

operativa, capacit√† relazionali e di lavoro in gruppo.







Altre informazioni

Full time 36 ore settimanali

Title: Data Business Insight & Development ‚ÄìBanking Sector
HTML:
NTT DATA Italia √® parte della multinazionale giapponese NTT DATA, uno dei principali player a livello mondiale nell‚Äôambito della Consulenza e dei Servizi IT. Digitale, Consulenza, Cyber Security e System Integration sono solo alcune delle principali linee di business. La nostra missione √® creare valore per i nostri clienti attraverso l‚Äôinnovazione.

NTT DATA conta su una presenza globale in oltre 50 Paesi, pi√π di 150.000 professionisti e una rete internazionale di centri di ricerca e sviluppo; √® presente in Italia con oltre 6000 dipendenti e in 11 citt√†: Milano, Roma, Torino, Treviso, Genova, Bologna, Pisa, Napoli, Salerno, Bari e Cosenza.

Abbiamo costruito una Smile Working Company in cui la cura, l‚Äôascolto delle persone, il loro benessere e sviluppo delle competenze sono la nostra priorit√†. Abbiamo creato spazi di lavoro che favoriscono il senso di comunit√† e lo scambio costruttivo di esperienze.

Descrizione del Ruolo

Siamo alla ricerca di un Data Business Insight & Development con esperienza sul mercato Bancario.

Il/la candidato/a ideale avr√† una profonda conoscenza dei processi aziendali e di business del settore specifico, unita ad una solida esperienza nell‚Äôanalisi dati e nelle possibili soluzioni analitiche da realizzare. Si richiedono anche conoscenze tecnologiche nell‚Äôambito Dati, per supportare progettualit√† di Reporting and Analytics.

Ci aspettiamo che l'approccio al Cliente sia guidato da motivazione, proattivit√†, forte orientamento al risultato e capacit√† di riconoscere le necessit√† di business per proporre le soluzioni pi√π adeguate

Responsabilit√†

  • Sviluppo Business e realizzazione di proposition di business in ambito Data & Analytics per I clienti appartenenti al settore bancario;
  • Collaborazione con i team funzionali per raccogliere e comprendere i requisiti di business e tradurli in requisiti applicativi;
  • Consulenza e supporto ai clienti su soluzioni Data & Analytics;
  • Identificazione di opportunit√† di miglioramento nei processi aziendali tramite l'uso di Data & Analytics.


Requisiti Tecnici

  • Esperienza consolidata di almeno 5 anni su mercato bancario;
  • Esperienza consolidata in progettualit√† Data & Analytics;
  • Ottima propensione alla realizzazione di documentazione orientata al business;
  • Ottima conoscenza della lingua inglese.


Power Skills

  • Capacit√† di problem finding/solving e flessibilit√† nell'affrontare sfide;
  • Eccellenti capacit√† interpersonali e di comunicazione per collaborare efficacemente con i team interni e i Clienti;
  • Innata propensione al business ed al rapporto consulenziale con i Clienti;
  • Ottima Conoscenza del pacchetto Office.


Il possesso di una o pi√π delle seguenti certificazioni, costituisce un PLUS:

  • Microsoft Certified: Data Analyst Associate
  • Certified Business Analysis Professional (CBAP)
  • Microsoft Certified: Azure Data Scientist Associate
  • Google Data Analytics Professional Certificate
  • AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner


Sedi: Roma, Milano

Title: SENIOR QUANTITATIVE ANALYST AND DATA SCIENTIST
Description:
Descrizione azienda

EP Produzione √® la societ√† italiana di generazione elettrica del Gruppo energetico ceco EPH. Con una capacit√† di generazione complessiva di 5,2 GW, attraverso cinque impianti a gas e uno a carbone, √® il 5¬∞ produttore di energia in Italia

Posizione

La risorsa verr√† inserita nella Direzione Energy Management e sar√† dedicata principalmente allo sviluppo di algoritmi strategici.

Nello Specifico, La Figura Professionale Avr√† La Responsabilit√† Di


Sviluppare modelli di ottimizzazione delle strategie sui vari segmenti di mercato in cui opera l‚Äôazienda sulla base delle necessit√† delle aree funzionali della Direzione Energy Management.
Condurre analisi di dati per esaminare i processi della Direzione e migliorare l'efficienza e le operazioni.
Interpretare i dati e analizzare i risultati utilizzando tecniche statistiche.
Redazione reportistica periodica e/o on demand per la formulazione di previsioni di indirizzo relativamente all‚Äôandamento dei mercati e delle principali variabili macroeconomiche.
Approfondire novit√† e best practice relative agli ambiti progettuali di propria competenza.
Svolgere attivit√† di business intelligence attraverso l'analisi dei dati e seguire progetti di trasformazioni Data & Analytics definendo le migliori strategie basate sull‚Äôutilizzo dei dati per facilitare il raggiungimento degli obiettivi di business.


Requisiti


Percorso di studi in ambito matematico/statistico/economico;
Capacit√† quantitative e di problem solving supportate da un mindset analitico;
Propensione a lavorare in team e a collaborare con i colleghi anche delle altre funzioni;
Conoscenza dei principali applicativi Office e dei linguaggi di programmazione (a titolo esemplificativo: Python, Matlab, Visual Basic, C++);
Competenza nell'uso di strumenti di Business Intelligence (Power BI);
Buona conoscenza della lingua inglese.


Altre informazioni

Orario Full-time, con possibilit√† di effettuare lo Smart Working per alcuni giorni della settimana.

Disponibilit√† ad effettuare brevi ed occasionali trasferte.

Disponibilit√† immediata.

Title: KPMG Open Platform | Junior SQL Developer
Description:
The chance to build a better future is right in front of you

Do Work That Matters - Il tuo ruolo e le tue responsabilit√†

Vuoi fare un lavoro che sia davvero significativo e di impatto? In KPMG avrai l‚Äôopportunit√† di aiutare i clienti, la societ√†, le colleghe e i colleghi ad affrontare e risolvere le sfide pi√π attuali e complesse.

KPMG Open Platform √® il nostro nuovo Hub innovativo con sede a Napoli creato per sviluppare modelli di servizio e soluzioni ad alto contenuto tecnologico per le imprese e la Pubblica Amministrazione. Le aree di intervento includono Cyber Security, Program Management su grandi cantieri di trasformazione del settore Pubblico, Application Maintenance e Managed Services.

Entrando a far parte del Team, sarai impegnata/o nella gestione dei processi di cambiamento aziendali legati alla manutenzione e ottimizzazione dei software sviluppati internamente da KPMG. Lavorerai a stretto contatto con colleghe e colleghi esperti nell‚Äôimplementazione di soluzioni digitali avanzate per clienti del settore Financial Services, garantendo l'efficienza operativa dei sistemi e supportando efficacemente i processi di business.

Nello specifico verrai coinvolto nelle seguenti attivit√†:


Implementare procedure complesse per la gestione dei processi aziendali
Creare query SQL per estrazione e/o eliminazione dati nei database
Gestire la manutenzione del Database e delle procedure per le query implementate
Redigere analisi tecniche di processi end-to-end e monitorare interfacce
Integrare i dati provenienti da diverse fonti o sistemi, lavorando su processi di ETL
Effettuare sessioni di formazione agli utenti aziendali
Supportare la fase di rilascio della soluzione e di Hypercare
Creare report personalizzati per gli utenti e sviluppare analisi dati volte a migliorare i dati stessi


Come As You Are - Le tue competenze e caratteristiche

Questa opportunit√† √® perfetta per te se:


Possiedi ottime capacit√† di comunicazione efficace, sei in grado di adottare il linguaggio pi√π appropriato in base all'interlocutore e di identificare e gestire le priorit√†
Sei interessato ad intraprendere un‚Äôesperienza sull‚Äôanalisi dati con forte orientamento all'innovazione tecnologica
Hai familiarit√† e interesse nel mondo della programmazione
Hai una buona padronanza della lingua inglese, preferibilmente con esperienze di studio all'estero
Hai conseguito un diploma o una laurea, triennale o magistrale, in ambito tecnico-scientifico


Your Future With Us - Cosa troverai in KPMG


Un ambiente di lavoro inclusivo, equo e che rispetta, incoraggia e valorizza le diversit√†
Un contesto stimolante e dinamico che incentiva la creativit√† e il lavoro di squadra
Modalit√† di lavoro ibrida, per promuovere un sano equilibrio tra vita lavorativa e personale
Programmi di formazione e sviluppo avanzati per rimanere sempre aggiornati
Minset internazionale e progettualit√† innovative
Iniziative incentrate sul benessere psicofisico


Together for Better ‚Äì I nostri valori e il nostro impegno

Leadership, lavoro in team, rispetto di ogni individualit√†, approfondimento continuo, trasparenza, impegno verso la comunit√†, integrit√†: questi sono i Valori di KPMG che danno vita a un ambiente aperto allo scambio di idee e di conoscenza, che permette ai nostri professionisti di esprimere tutto il loro potenziale.

Grazie all‚Äôimpegno nel favorire un ambiente di lavoro inclusivo, il nostro Network ha ottenuto le certificazioni ISO 30415, che attesta la conformit√† del Sistema di Gestione per la Diversit√† e l‚ÄôInclusione, e UNI PdR 125, che certifica la parit√† di genere. All‚Äôinterno del nostro Impact Plan - Our Impact Plan (kpmg.com) - trovi riassunte tutte le azioni concrete che stiamo portando avanti su tematiche ambientali, sociali e di governance (ESG).

Unisciti a noi!

I tuoi dati saranno trattati nel pieno rispetto delle disposizioni del Regolamento (UE) n. 679/2016 (General Data Protection Regulation - "GDPR") e successive modifiche. Per ulteriori informazioni, consultare l'informativa sulla privacy di KPMG.

KPMG Open Platform S.r.l. SB garantisce le pari opportunit√†.

The chance to build a better future is right in front of you

Do Work That Matters ‚Äì Your Role And Responsibilities

Do you want to do work that is truly meaningful and impactful? At KPMG, you‚Äôll have the opportunity to help clients, society, and colleagues tackle and solve the most current and complex challenges.

KPMG Open Platform is our new innovative Hub based in Naples , created to develop service models and high-tech solutions for businesses and Public Administration. The areas of focus include Cyber Security, Program Management for large-scale transformation projects in the Public sector, Application Maintenance, and Managed Services.

By joining our Team , you will be involved in managing business transformation processes related to the maintenance and optimization of software developed internally by KPMG. You will work closely with colleagues who are experts in implementing advanced digital solutions for clients in the Financial Services sector, ensuring the operational efficiency of systems and effectively supporting business processes.

Specifically, you will be involved in the following activities:


Implementing complex procedures for managing business processes
Writing SQL queries for extracting and/or deleting data in databases
Managing the maintenance of the Database and the procedures for the implemented queries
Drafting technical analyses of end-to-end processes and monitoring interfaces
Integrating data from different sources or systems, working on ETL processes
Delivering training sessions to corporate users
Supporting the solution release and Hypercare phase
Creating customized reports for users and performing data analyses to improve data quality


Come As You Are ‚Äì Your Skills And Characteristics

This opportunity is perfect for you if:


You have excellent communication skills and can adapt your language to different audiences while effectively identifying and managing priorities
You are interested in gaining experience in data analysis with a strong focus on technological innovation
You have familiarity and interest in the programming field
You have a good command of the English language, preferably with study-abroad experience
You have earned a diploma or a bachelor‚Äôs/master‚Äôs degree in a technical-scientific field


Your Future With Us ‚Äì What You‚Äôll Find at KPMG


An inclusive and fair workplace that respects, encourages, and values diversity
A stimulating and dynamic environment that promotes creativity and teamwork
A hybrid working model to support a healthy work-life balance
Advanced training and development programs to keep your skills up to date
An international mindset and innovative projects
Initiatives focused on physical and mental well-being


Together for Better ‚Äì Our Values and Commitment

Leadership, teamwork, respect for individuality, continuous learning, transparency, community commitment, and integrity: these are the Values of KPMG that create an environment open to the exchange of ideas and knowledge, allowing our professionals to reach their full potential.

Thanks to our commitment to fostering an inclusive workplace , our Network has earned ISO 30415 certification , attesting to the compliance of our Diversity and Inclusion Management System, and UNI PdR 125 certification for gender equality.

You can find a summary of all the concrete actions we are taking on environmental, social, and governance (ESG) issues in our Impact Plan ‚Äì Our Impact Plan .

Join us!

Your data will be processed in full compliance with Regulation (EU) No. 679/2016 (General Data Protection Regulation ‚Äì "GDPR") and subsequent amendments. For more information, please refer to KPMG‚Äôs privacy policy.

KPMG Open Platform S.r.l. SB ensures equal opportunities.

Title: AI Specialist
Description:
AI Specialist




L'AI Specialist contribuir√† alla progettazione, allo sviluppo e all'implementazione di soluzioni basate sull'Intelligenza Artificiale.




Il/la candidato/a si occuper√† principalmente delle seguenti attivit√†:




Progettare, sviluppare e implementare modelli di Machine Learning e Deep Learning per risolvere problematiche aziendali specifiche.
Analizzare e pre-elaborare grandi volumi di dati strutturati e non strutturati.
Ottimizzare le prestazioni dei modelli tramite tecniche avanzate di tuning e validazione.
Collaborare con il team IT per integrare soluzioni AI nei sistemi esistenti e garantire la scalabilit√† delle applicazioni.
Realizzare prototipi per la sperimentazione di nuove tecnologie AI e per la validazione di use case.
Monitorare e mantenere i modelli AI/ML in produzione per garantirne l'affidabilit√† e le performance nel tempo.
Identificare e implementare algoritmi innovativi per il miglioramento dei processi aziendali.
Curare la documentazione tecnica relativa ai progetti AI e fornire supporto tecnico e formazione ai colleghi meno esperti nell'adozione di tecnologie AI.




SKILLS RICHIESTE:




Laurea in Informatica, Ingegneria, Matematica, Statistica o discipline affini.
Costituisce titolo preferenziale il possesso di un Dottorato in Informatica, Ingegneria Informatica, Data Science o Intelligenza Artificiale.
Esperienza di 4/5 anni nello sviluppo e implementazione di soluzioni di Intelligenza Artificiale.
Solida esperienza nella Generative AI, inclusa la progettazione, implementazione e ottimizzazione di modelli generativi.
Conoscenza avanzata dei linguaggi di programmazione.
Esperienza con framework e librerie di Machine Learning e Deep Learning (TensorFlow, PyTorch, Scikit-learn, Keras, ecc.).
Competenze avanzate in gestione dei dati: utilizzo di database SQL/NoSQL e strumenti per big data (Hadoop, Spark).
Conoscenza di tecniche di Natural Language Processing (NLP) e Computer Vision.
Esperienza con piattaforme cloud e strumenti di MLOps per la gestione del ciclo di vita dei modelli AI.




Il nostro Cliente √® una prestigiosa realt√† nell'ambito Technology

Location: Roma, in modalit√† ibrida

Title: Software Developer DataStage, Italy
Description:
About Us

We‚Äôre visionary innovators who provide trading and workflow automation solutions, high-value analytics, and strategic consulting to corporations, financial institutions, central banks, and governments. More than 40% of the world‚Äôs largest companies use our solutions. We‚Äôve achieved tremendous growth by bringing together some of the best and most successful financial technology companies in the world.

At ION, we offer careers that provide many opportunities: To invent. To design. To collaborate. To build. To transform businesses and empower people around the world to do more, faster and better than before. Imagine what you can do and experience. This is where you can do your best work.

Learn more at iongroup.com.

Your Role

Your duties and responsibilities


Selected candidates will manage the entire software lifecycle, from design to implementation, and will be trained in the main banking processes with the aim of collaborating in the creation of important information system evolution projects.
They will be placed within teams that deal with the design, implementation and maintenance of software products and information systems for the provision of services to banks and related processes.
They will participate in new product implementation projects and support the transition of our platform to evolved Cloud systems, in a dynamic and international context.


Other duties

We might ask you to perform other tasks and duties as your role expands.

Your Skills, Experience, And Qualifications Required


Bachelor's degree with honors in technical/scientific areas (computer science, mathematics, physics, computer engineering, management engineering, economics)
Knowledge of and ability to use programming languages DataStage / .Net / Java
Applied skills in relational databases, object-oriented programming, interfaces
Expertise in programming, technical and/or functional analysis
At least two to five years of experience in software development
Excellent knowledge of the English language
Excellent interpersonal skills
Excellent communication and negotiation skills, aptitude for teamwork


What We Offer

Permanent employment contract

Location:

Roma, Italy

Important Notes

According to the Italian Law (L.68/99) please note that candidates from the disability list will be given priority.
